About me

I received my PhD degree from UC Berkeley with a focus of applying deep generative models on transportation problems. I love all kind of problems that associated with data and can be solved using various machine learning methods, from regression to deep learning. Feel free to checkout my previous projects. Some of them are available on Github: LSTM human mobility model, hand drawing recognition.

I play tennis, read books and cook delicious seafood.
